title: People Are Canceling Their Netflix Accounts | Fred And Angi | 103.5 KISS FM
text:
People Are Canceling Their Netflix Accounts posted by @PaulinaRoe - share 
Netflix recently dropped the trailer for its new show called "Dear White People". 
In the 30-second clip, the narrator asks White people to stop using blackface as part of their Halloween costumes. 
Twitter went up in arms accusing this show of being “anti-white”. Netflix announced a new anti-white show (Dear White People) that promotes white genocide.I cancelled my account, do the same. #NoNetflix pic.twitter.com/2HIGqviLHj — Baked Alaska™ (@bakedalaska) February 8, 2017 Contact
